subtitle: or, the sum of the evidence, on the trial of A.B. C.D. and E.F., all M.D. for the death of one Robert at Orfud, at a special commission of oyer and terminer held at Justice-College, in W---ck-Lane, before Sir Asculepius Dosem, Dr. Timberhead, and others, their fellows, justices, &c.
